```{r}
library(sfcr)
```

```{r}
eqs <- sfcr_set(
####output - eq.
h_d ~ h_d[-1] + (h_s - h_s[-1]), 
cs ~ cd,
is ~ id,
ns ~ nd,
ls ~ ls[-1] + (ld - ld[-1]), 
y ~ cs + is + g,
wbd ~ y - r[-1]*ld[-1] - af - e_u,  
af ~ delta*k[-1],
ld~ld[-1] + id - af - (e_s-e_s[-1])*p_e[-1], 
h_s~ h_s[-1]+(bl_cb-bl_cb[-1])*p_bl, 
##### Virksomhedernes ønskede aktie beholdning ligninger 
vf ~ k - ld - e_s*p_e,   
e_u~ e_h[-1]*p_e[-1]*beta1,  
#####Financial sectors overskud 
z~ls[-1]*r[-1], 
wbs ~ w*ns, 
nd ~ y/pr, 
w ~ wbd/nd, 
k ~ k[-1] + id - da, 
da ~ delta*k[-1],
kt ~ kappa * y[-1],
id ~ gamma*(kt-k[-1]) + da,
####### udbud af aktier
e_s~ e_s_bar, 
####Regulær disponibel indkomst - eq.
yd ~ wbs - t  + p_bl[-1]*bl_h[-1]*r_bl[-1]+ z + e_u,   
####Skat - eq. 5.3 
t ~ theta*(wbs+z)+theta1*(e_u+ p_bl[-1]*bl_h[-1]*r_bl[-1]), 
####Akkumulering af formue - eq. 5.4
v ~ v[-1] + (yd - cd) + cg,  
v_i ~ v,
####kapitalgevinster - eq. 5.5
cg ~ (p_e-p_e[-1])*e_h[-1], 
####forbrugsfunktion - eq. 5.6
cd ~ alpha1*yd_e + alpha2*v[-1],
####forventet formue - eq. 5.7
v_e ~ v_i, 
####Kontanter - eq. 5.8
m_h ~ v_i - bl_h*p_bl - p_e*e_h - h_h,   
####Eftersp�rgsel efter kontanter - eq. 5.9
m_d ~ v_e - bl_d*p_bl- p_e*e_d  - h_d,
####Efterspørgsel efter aktier
p_e ~ v_e*(lambda20 + lambda22*er_re + lambda23*er_rbl + lambda24*(yd_e/v_e))/e_s, 
e_d ~ v_e*(lambda20 + lambda22*er_re + lambda23*er_rbl + lambda24*(yd_e/v_e))/p_e, 
####Eftersp�rgsel efter bonds - eq. 5.11
bl_d ~ v_e*(lambda30 + lambda32*er_re + lambda33*er_rbl + lambda34*(yd_e/v_e))/p_bl,
####bl_h - eq. 5.13
bl_h ~ bl_d,
h_h ~ h_d,
####Udbud af bounds - eq. 5.14
bl_s ~ bl_s[-1] + (((g +p_bl[-1]*bl_s[-1]*r_bl[-1]) - (t + p_bl[-1]*bl_cb[-1]*r_bl[-1]))/p_bl),
vg ~ -bl_s*p_bl,
####Udbud af kontanter - eq. 5.15
m_s~m_s[-1]+(ls-ls[-1]),
####bl_cb - eq. 5.16
bl_cb~ bl_s - bl_h, 
####forventet afkast p� bonds - eq. 5.18
er_rbl ~ er_rbl_bar,
####Forventet afkast på aktier 
er_re ~ er_re_bar,
####rente p� bonds(lange rente) - eq. 5.19
r_bl ~ er_rbl/p_bl, 
####forventet regul�r disponibel indkomst - eq. 5.22
yd_e ~ yd[-1],
#### pris - eq. 5.24
p_bl ~ p_bl_bar,
#### holdte aktier
e_h ~ e_d,
###### Andele af beholdninger
aaa~ (e_d*p_e)/v,
aao~ (bl_h*p_bl)/v,
aap~ (m_d+h_d)/v,
##### test
wealth~p_e*e_d + p_bl*bl_h + m_h + h_d,
tv ~ v + vf + vg,
yd_v_ratio~yd/v,
u_o ~ r_bl[-1]*bl_h[-1]*p_bl[-1],
r ~ r_bar,
beta1 ~ er_re/100,
####Volatility
g ~ g_in + vol*g_bar,
g_bar ~ vol_1*g_bar[-1] + sigma_1*varepsilon, 
sigma_1 ~ (1- rho_q)*log_q + rho_q*sigma_1[-1] + neta* u_t,
)
```

```{r}
external <- sfcr_set(
####Parameterværdier
delta ~ 0.1,
alpha1 ~ 0.748,
alpha2 ~ 0.09, 
lambda20 ~ 0.57,
lambda22 ~ 0.0166,
lambda23 ~ -0.0491,
lambda24 ~ -0.1, 
lambda30 ~ 0.1, 
lambda32 ~ -0.015,
lambda33 ~ 0.0183,
lambda34 ~ -0.015,
theta ~ 0.4,
theta1 ~ 0.27,
gamma ~ 0.1, 
kappa ~ 1,
pr ~ 1,
beta ~ 0.8,  
####eksogene variable
g_in ~ 20,
r_bar ~ 0.04, 
p_bl_bar ~ 100,
####initialværdier for laggede endogene variable
er_rbl_bar ~ 1,
er_re_bar ~3,
e_s_bar~37.17,
####Volatilitets measures
vol ~ 1,
vol_1 ~ 0.6,
varepsilon ~ sfcr_random("rnorm", mean=0, sd= 1),
u_t ~ sfcr_random("rnorm", mean=0, sd= 1),
rho_q ~ 0.6,
log_q ~ 1,
neta ~ 1, 
  )
```


```{r}
initial <- sfcr_set(
r_bl ~ 0.01,
h_s ~ 4, 
p_e ~ 1,
e_h ~ 37.17,   
ls ~ 29.23,  
ld ~ 29.23,  
k ~ 66.4,
y ~ 56,
r ~ 0.04,
v ~ 70.4,
vf ~ 0,
vg ~ -4,
bl_h ~ 0,
m_s ~ 29.23, 
m_h ~ 29.23, 
bl_s ~ 0.04, 
bl_cb ~ 0.04, 
h_d ~ 4,
yd ~ 30,
p_bl ~ 100,
cg ~ 0,
er_re ~ 3,
e_s~ 37.17,   
er_rbl ~ 1,
g_bar ~ 5,
sigma_1 ~ 1,
)
```


```{r}
sim <- sfcr_baseline(
  equations = eqs,
  ations = eqs, 
  external = external,
  initial = initial,
  periods = 60, 
  )
```

```{r}
sim
```

```{r}
shock <- sfcr_shock(
  variables = sfcr_set(
    neta ~ 2),
  start = 10,
  end = 60
)
```


```{r}
sim2 <- sfcr_scenario(
  baseline = sim,
  scenario = shock,
  periods = 60
  )
```
